00000001 18840008 // addi $4 $4 8
00000002 30220000 // lw $2,0($1) 
00000003 00000000
00000004 00000000
00000005 00431800 // add $3, $3, $2
00000006 18210001 // addi $1,$1,1
00000007 18A50001 // addi $5,$5,1
00000008 00000000
00000009 00000000
0000000A 20850003 // beq $4,$5,finish
0000000B 00000000

0000000D 38000002 // jump 1
